attributes.action: Get Spitting Images - Santa Clause is on The Dole to Christmas No1 2014.
attributes.additional_details:
I would love to see this Christmas song get to Number one this year as we cannot let   X - Factor and Simon Cowell ruin our Festive Period.

This was a fantastic song when it first came out and I am sure there are lots of Politicians who would also love this to get to number one and maybe it will help bring back Spitting Image as it was like not in CGI but as it was left untouched.

I know I would love to see versions of the latest MPs on a new show as well.
